text: Savage: People always say, Oh modern technology
has made life so much better than what
it used to be but honestly I think being
a caveman would have been pretty cool it
was way back in college and we used to
hold these amazing parties
I don't want to brag but we had one of
the best jungle juice recipes on campus
I can't reveal it to you because it's
like our family secret we've been
passing it from my semester to semester
needless to say our parties were always
wild one thing I've learned over my
years of drinking is that there's
different types of drunk
everyone's a little bit different
there's sad drunk you always find them
locked up in a room crying oh he doesn't
love me
there's the angry drunks who are always
trying to start a fight. BRAH what'd you say? this
is my house BRAH, you F-ing dead
there's the lightweights you can always
find them in the bathroom  *blarg* Samantha
promise me, promise me that I'll never
drink againnnnnn and then there's the hungry
drunks because every time I drink I just
want to the eat. everything tastes so much
better when you're drunk so it was
around midnight and the party was
getting wild but that's when I felt it
you know...the urge
so I decide to step out and walk to the
campus food court
I get to the front of the food court and
I noticed that is this car just stopped
in the middle of the road
nobody was in the car everyone was
outside of it looking under the car so I
go over to them and I'm like what was
what're you guys looking at
oh my god so when we were driving onto
campus we hit a DEER
oh my god is that ok? yeah it stood up
and ran away but after driving onto
campus we kept hearing a noise from
under the car and that's why we stopped
oh my god it's disgusting
so i peek under the car and I kid you
not there's a deer leg
stuck on the bottom of this car from the
hoof all the way to the top of the thigh
an entire deer's leg. and the girls are just
freaking out because none of them want
to touch it
luckily for them i'm also very
spontaneous drunk things like this it'll
phase me when I'm in the zone also i was
in front of a group of girls and I, you
know,
couldn't let them down *WINK* so I go under the
car and I grab the hoof and I just pull. it
pops right out and there I am standing
with a deer leg in my hand and it's at
this moment that I felt this surge of
energy coursing through my veins
it was like a primal instinct had been
awakened something that was hidden away
in my core something that I was meant to
do with my previous life
oh yeah it felt amazing I felt like a
man for the second time in my life the
first time of course being the time I
stubbed my pinky toe and I held in all
my tears... are you going to throw it away
what hell no I'm bring this back to my
cave for my family so I run back to the
party *running sound effect* and i kick open the door
*KAPOW* we're feasting tonight ladies and
gentlemen
well unfortunately my suitemates weren't
as keen to cooking a deer's leg for the
party that night what a bunch of
lame-o's. this project could not have
been made possible without the help my
friend Aidan he did all of the animation
work and he's only 13 please show him
some love
check out his channel because kids as
young as him with that sort of work
ethic deserve to be commended for those
of you wondering why i'm uploading a
story to a channel about
self-development tune in next week and
we're going to talk about the magic of
storytelling
